name: Indus Rite Metals
overview:
Indus Rite Metals was formed in 2010 as a Partnership Company. Since then, we are engaged in Aluminium recycling job. We manufacture & supply a comprehensive range of Aluminium Alloys as Aluminium Alloy Ingots. Our products consist of Aluminium Ingots, Aluminium Alloy Ingots. Manufactured using quality approved raw materials, our range is highly acknowledged among clients for their features such as corrosion resistance, sturdy construction, durability, high tensile strength, compact designs, long service life and many more.

We procure raw material from vendors, whom we have selected after conducting in-depth market research. In this, their past industrial record, experience, credibility and prompt delivery schedule are stringently examined. Apart from this, to maintain the excellence of our range, we are following rigorous and industrial defined quality control policies. This has helped us in supplying error free products in the market. For easy monetary transaction, we provide varied payment options to our valuable clientele. It is due to our ethical business policies, fair practices and transparent dealings that we have established a remarkable place in this competitive industry.
